projects.name: Digitizing Tangerines' Range of Financial Services
projects.theWhat: Imagine having a single app that lets you bank, save, spend, insure, invest, and manage your money...
projects.theWhy: Tangerine had been insuring and developing savings plans for customers using the traditional approach...
projects.theHow: The development process involved iterative design sprints, user feedback integration, and cross-team collaboration...
projects.challenges: The most challenging aspect was integrating a seamless user experience...
projects.keyMotivators: Key motivators included user-centric design principles...
projects.resultsAndLearning: The project resulted in a user-friendly app that met user needs, improved usability, and increased satisfaction...

projects.name: Project 2
projects.theWhat: Project 2 focused on creating a collaborative tool...
projects.theWhy: The goal was to enhance productivity for remote teams...
projects.theHow: The solution was developed through Agile methodology...
projects.challenges: Tight deadlines and a shifting scope presented difficulties...
projects.keyMotivators: A key factor was the demand for remote work tools...
projects.resultsAndLearning: The tool significantly improved team communication and task management...
